column2: "Paul nye Silvanus nye Timoti dze kɛma Tesalonika asɔr a ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn Egya no nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest mu no: Adom nye asomdwee nka hom."
"Yɛda Nyankopɔn ase daa wɔ hom nyina ntsi
column3: yɛbɔ hom dzin wɔ hɛn asɔryɛ mu;"

column2: "na daa yɛkaa hom gyedzi ndwuma nye hom dɔ mbɔdzembɔ
column3: nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest mu enyidado ho abotar
column4: wɔ hɛn Nyankopɔn nye Egya no enyim;"
yenyim ɔsan a ɔasan mu eyi hom
column6: "osiandɛ hɛn asɛmpa no ammba hom nkyɛn dɛ kasa ara kwa
column7: na mbom ɔbae wɔ tum mu
column9: nye ntseasee pii mu; dɛ mbrɛ hom nyim hɛn nyimpa ban a yɛdaa no edzi dɛ yɛyɛ wɔ hom afamu no."

column2: "Na hom so suaa hɛn nye Ewuradze
column3: dze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ne dɛw no gyee asɛm no wɔ ahohia pii mu;"

column2: "na hom bɛyɛɛ fasusu maa hɔn a wɔgye dzi nyina wɔ Masidonia nye Akaia nyina."
"Na ofi hom mu na Nyankopɔn n’asɛm no apetse
column4: na mbom mbea nyina so hom gyedzi a ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn afamu ekodu hɔ
column5: ma onnhia dɛ yɛka ho asɛm bi mpo."

column2: "Na hɔnara ka hɛn ho asɛm kyerɛ kwan kor a yenyae wɔ hom mu
column3: na mbrɛ hom danee fii ehonyisom ho baa Nyankopɔn hɔ
column4: dɛ hom robɔsom Nyankopɔn tseasefo nokwafo no
column6: "na hom atweɔn ne Ba a onyaan no fii ewufo mu no efi sor
column7: mekyerɛ Jesus a ɔgye hɛn fi ebufuw a ɔreba no mu no."
